org.gvsig.raster.georeferencing.swing.impl.tool

Class BaseViewTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.georeferencing.swing.impl.tool.BaseViewTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasTool, ToolListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PanTool, SelectCoordOnViewTool, ZoomRectangleTool, ZoomWheelTool

    public abstract class BaseViewTool
extends Object
implements CanvasTool, ToolListener
    Clase base de la que deben extender las herramientas para la vista del zoom.
